name: playwright-test-skeleton
description: Package for creating Playwright Test skeleton project. Includes default linter, formatter and precommit-hooks settings.
author: Radek Bednarik<radek.bednarik@tesena.com>

scripts.test: npm link && mkdir __test-area__ && cd __test-area__ && npm link playwright-test-skeleton && npx playwright-test-skeleton --language=ts --precommitHooks=true && npx playwright test && cd ..
scripts.test-js: npm link && mkdir __test-area__ && cd __test-area__ && npm link playwright-test-skeleton && npx playwright-test-skeleton --language=js --precommitHooks=false && npx playwright test && cd ..
